trans-unit.source: Buttons: Controls the order of buttons. Be careful: Buttons disappear when using wrong key names here.
orcid: All save buttons are visible. No dropdown anymore.
Show label of "save" button: Show the label of this button. Just the icon will be visible.
Show label of "save and preview" button: Show the label of this button. Just the icon will be visible.
Show label of "save and new" button: Show the label of this button. Just the icon will be visible.
Show label of "save and close" button: Show the label of this button. Just the icon will be visible.
Allow custom user settings: The settings above are treated as defaults and users can override them in their user settings.
Show label of "save and preview" button
Show label of "save and new" button
Show label of "save and close" button
